remarks.format: ## Remarks 是 、 和 的基底類別。 is the base class for , , and . 使用和其關聯的類別，在新的 Windows Forms 應用程式，來建立 Windows XP、 Office、 Internet Explorer 中，或自訂外觀和行為，都可以透過或佈景主題，而不支援溢位和執行階段的項目可以有的工具列重新排列。Use and its associated classes in new Windows Forms applications to create toolbars that can have a Windows XP, Office, Internet Explorer, or custom appearance and behavior, all with or without themes, and with support for overflow and run-time item reordering. 控制項還會提供豐富的設計階段體驗，包括就地啟用和編輯、 自訂的版面配置，以及共用的水平或垂直空間內指定。 controls also offer a rich design-time experience that includes in-place activation and editing, custom layout, and sharing of horizontal or vertical space within a specified . 類別提供許多管理繪製、 滑鼠和鍵盤輸入，以及拖放功能的成員。The class provides many members that manage painting, mouse and keyboard input, and drag-and-drop functionality. 使用類別搭配類別，以取得更多的控制權和自訂能力繪製和配置的所有樣式Windows 表單上的控制項。Use the class with the class to gain even more control and customizability over the painting and layout style of all controls on a Windows Form. 下列項目專為與兩者都能完美合作和在所有方向。The following items are specifically designed to work seamlessly with both and in all orientations. 它們是在設計階段的預設可用的控制項：They are available by default at design time for the control: - - - - - - - 您可以加入內指定的控制項和合併彼此的控制項。You can join controls within a specified and merge controls with each other. 使用而非多重文件介面 (MDI) 應用程式。Use rather than for Multiple Document Interface (MDI) applications. 通常不會參與定位順序中，除非絕對位置，而非停駐或。Typically, a does not participate in the tab order unless it is absolutely positioned rather than being docked or in a . 使用類別，以裝載中的任何其他 Windows Form 控制項。Use the class to host any other Windows Forms control in a . 根據預設，是雙重緩衝處理，而且可充分設定。By default, the is double buffered, taking advantage of the setting. 雖然 會取代並且將功能加入至之前版本的 控制項；不過，也可以選擇保留 ，以提供回溯相容性 (Backward Compatibility) 以及供未來使用。Although replaces and adds functionality to the control of previous versions, is retained for both backward compatibility and future use if you choose. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何將並至 Windows Forms 中，新增項目，並新增來的。The following code example demonstrates adding a and a to a Windows Forms, adding items to the , and adding the to the of the . remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您設定要`false`和內嵌於 面板中的界限移動時，不會轉譯至不同的面板。If you set to `false` and the is embedded in a panel, the bounds of the are not translated when you move the to a different panel of the . 若要正確地解譯界限，同步處理事件，檢查的值屬性，並調整大小。To translate the bounds properly, synchronize the event, check the value of the property, and resize the . ， ， ， ，和屬性屬於映像處理的各種層面。The , , , , and properties pertain to various aspects of image handling. 使用中的映像控制項，藉由設定這些屬性直接或藉由設定執行時間-僅限屬性。Use images in controls by setting these properties directly or by setting the run-time-only property. 影像縮放取決於屬性中的互動和、，如下所示：Image scaling is determined by the interaction of properties in both and , as follows: - 小數位數的映像的組合所決定的最終映像設定和容器的設定。 is the scale of the final image as determined by the combination of the image's setting and the container's setting. - 如果是`true`（預設值） 和是，沒有映像將會進行調整，而大小是最大的項目或指定的最小大小。If is `true` (the default) and is , no image scaling occurs, and the size is that of the largest item, or a prescribed minimum size. - 如果是`false`並是，沒有映像，也不進行調整。If is `false` and is , neither image nor scaling occurs. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定一般的語法屬性，包括屬性。The following code example demonstrates the syntax for setting common properties, including the property. One of the values.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來定義如何其父控制項調整大小時，會自動調整大小。Use the property to define how a is automatically resized as its parent control is resized. 例如，設定要導致本身配合其父控制項的左邊緣，並調整大小的父控制項調整大小時。For example, setting to causes the to align itself with the left edges of its parent control and to resize as the parent control is resized. 控制項停駐在其的疊置順序，也就是表單的 z 軸 （深度） 以及在表單上控制項的視覺分層。Controls are docked in their z-order, which is the visual layering of controls on a form along the form's z-axis (depth). 控制項可以固定到其父容器的一個邊緣或所有邊緣可以停都駐並填滿父容器。A control can be docked to one edge of its parent container or can be docked to all edges and fill the parent container. 如果控制項處於，則可以內重新定位和跨s。If the control is in a , the can be repositioned within the and across s. 屬性會被忽略，而且如果屬性是`false`，則大小成長，因為項目會加入。The property is ignored, and if the property is `false`, the size of the grows as items are added to the . 一般而言，不會參與的索引標籤順序。Typically, the does not participate in the tab order. > [!NOTE] > 和屬性互斥。The and properties are mutually exclusive. 只有一個可以設定一次和最後一個設定的優先順序。Only one can be set at a time, and the last one set takes precedence. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定一般的語法屬性，包括屬性。The following code example demonstrates the syntax for setting common properties, including the property. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.CommonProps#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.CommonProps/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.CommonProps#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.CommonProps/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks ， ， ， ，和屬性屬於映像處理的各種層面。The , , , , and properties pertain to various aspects of image handling. 使用中的映像控制項，藉由設定這些屬性直接或藉由設定執行時間-僅限屬性。Use images in controls by setting these properties directly or by setting the run-time-only property. 影像縮放取決於屬性中的互動和、，如下所示：Image scaling is determined by the interaction of properties in both and , as follows: - 小數位數的映像的組合所決定的最終映像設定和容器的設定。 is the scale of the final image as determined by the combination of the image's setting and the container's setting. - 如果是`true`（預設值） 和是，沒有映像將會進行調整，而大小是最大的項目或指定的最小大小。If is `true` (the default) and is , no image scaling occurs, and the size is that of the largest item, or a prescribed minimum size. - 如果是`false`並是，沒有映像，也不進行調整。If is `false` and is , neither image nor scaling occurs.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，即可控制映像的預設大小。Use the property to control the default size of an image. 使用上進行影像的大小自動調整以便容納同時保留原始的影像比例。Use to make the size of the image on a to automatically adjust to fit on a while retaining the original image proportions. ， ， ， ，和屬性屬於映像處理的各種層面。The , , , , and properties pertain to various aspects of image handling. 使用中的映像控制項，藉由設定這些屬性直接或藉由設定執行時間-僅限屬性。Use images in controls by setting these properties directly or by setting the run-time-only property. 影像縮放取決於屬性中的互動和、，如下所示：Image scaling is determined by the interaction of properties in both and , as follows: - 小數位數的映像的組合所決定的最終映像設定和容器的設定。 is the scale of the final image as determined by the combination of the image's setting and the container's setting. - 如果是`true`（預設值） 和是，沒有映像將會進行調整，而大小是最大的項目或指定的最小大小。If is `true` (the default) and is , no image scaling occurs, and the size is that of the largest item, or a prescribed minimum size. - 如果是`false`並是，沒有映像，也不進行調整。If is `false` and is , neither image nor scaling occurs. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定一般的語法屬性，包括屬性。The following code example demonstrates the syntax for setting common properties, including the property. remarks.format: ## Remarks 視窗訊息前置處理以判斷應該經過前置處理或直接傳送至指定的輸入的字元時呼叫方法。The method is called during window message preprocessing to determine whether the given input character should be preprocessed or sent directly to the . 如果方法會傳回`true`，指定的字元直接傳送至。If the method returns `true`, the specified character is sent directly to the . 不過，如果此方法會傳回`false`，字元會前置處理過的並只傳送至如果它不由前置處理階段。However, if the method returns `false`, the character is preprocessed and only sent to the if it is not consumed by the preprocessing phase. 前置處理的字元包括檢查的字元是否為另一個控制項的助憶鍵。The preprocessing of a character includes checking whether the character is a mnemonic of another control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當項目容納不下，溢位按鈕就會自動出現。When items do not fit within the , an overflow button automatically appears. 屬性設定會決定項目是否已出現在溢位區域往常，如有需要或永遠不會。The property setting determines whether an item appears in the overflow area always, as needed, or never. 檢查中的屬性事件，以判斷項目是否已放在主要，溢位，或如果它目前未顯示完全。Inspect the property in the event to determine whether an item was placed on the main , the overflow , or if it is not currently showing at all. 常見的原因為何不會顯示項目是項目，不適合在主要並將其屬性設定為。The typical reasons why an item is not displayed are that the item did not fit on the main and its property was set to . 如需有關如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換具有或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`ToolStrip1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `ToolStrip1`. 請確定 與關聯的事件處理常式事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 當在衍生類別中覆寫 時，請確定呼叫基底類別的 方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在處理對話方塊字元，例如 TAB、 RETURN、 逸出，和方向鍵前置處理的訊息呼叫方法。The method is called during message preprocessing to handle dialog characters such as TAB, RETURN, ESCAPE, and arrow keys. 只有當呼叫這個方法方法會指示控制項未處理的索引鍵。This method is called only if the method indicates that the control is not processing the key. 只是傳送至父控制項的 字元方法，則傳回`false`如果控制項沒有父代。The simply sends the character to the parent control's method, or returns `false` if the control has no parent. 類別會覆寫此方法以執行實際處理對話方塊按鍵。The class overrides this method to perform actual processing of dialog box keys. 當控制項裝載在 Windows Forms 應用程式或 ActiveX 控制項中時，只會呼叫這個方法。This method is only called when the control is hosted in a Windows Forms application or an ActiveX control.

para.span: 在覆寫方法在衍生類別中的，控制項應該傳回指出它已處理的索引鍵。

span.span: When overriding the method in a derived class, a control should return to indicate that it has processed the key.

para.span: 針對控制項，也就是呼叫基底類別的結果不會處理的索引鍵方法應該傳回。

span.span: For keys that are not processed by the control, the result of calling the base class's method should be returned.

para.span: 控制項將很少，鮮，需要覆寫這個方法。

span.span: Controls will seldom, if ever, need to override this method.

MemberSignature.Value: protected internal override bool ProcessMnemonic (char charCode);
.method familyorassemblyhidebysig virtual instance bool ProcessMnemonic(char charCode) cil managed
Protected Friend Overrides Function ProcessMnemonic (charCode As Char) As Boolean
protected public: override bool ProcessMnemonic(char charCode);

span.span: The character to process.

summary.span: 處理助憶鍵字元。

span.span: Processes a mnemonic character.

returns.span: 如果控制項已將字元當成助憶鍵處理，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the character was processed as a mnemonic by the control; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫方法，讓控制項有機會處理助憶鍵字元。The method is called to give a control the opportunity to process a mnemonic character. 此方法應該判斷控制項是否處於處理助憶鍵的狀態，以及指定的字元是否代表助憶鍵。This method should determine whether the control is in a state to process mnemonics and whether the given character represents a mnemonic. 如果因此，此方法應該執行的助憶鍵和傳回相關聯的動作`true`。If so, the method should perform the action associated with the mnemonic and return `true`. 如果不是，這個方法應傳回`false`。If not, the method should return `false`. 實作這個方法通常會使用方法，以判斷指定的字元是否符合助憶鍵在控制項的文字。Implementations of this method often use the method to determine whether the given character matches a mnemonic in the control's text. 預設實作方法只會傳回`false`，以指出控制項是否有任何的助憶鍵。This default implementation of the method simply returns `false`, to indicate that the control has no mnemonic.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `directed`和`forward`容器樣式控制項使用的參數。The `directed` and `forward` parameters are used by container-style controls. 當`directed`參數設定為`true`，則`forward`參數進行評估以判斷哪一個控制項來選取。When the `directed` parameter is set to `true`, the `forward` parameter is evaluated to determine which control to select. 當`forward`設為`true`，選取定位順序中的下一個控制項; 時`false`，選取上一個控制項的定位順序。When `forward` is set to `true`, the next control in the tab order is selected; when `false`, the previous control in the tab order is selected. 方法啟動的控制項，如果控制項的樣式位元設為`true`，它包含在另一個控制項，其所有父控制項都則顯示並啟用。The method activates the control if the control's style bit is set to `true`, it is contained in another control, and all its parent controls are both visible and enabled.

summary.span: 處理 Windows 訊息。

span.span: Processes Windows messages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所有訊息都會都傳送至方法之後取得透過篩選方法。All messages are sent to the method after getting filtered through the method. 方法完全對應於 Windows `WindowProc` 函式。The method corresponds exactly to the Windows `WindowProc` function. 如需有關處理 Windows 訊息的詳細資訊，請參閱 < `WindowProc` Windows Platform SDK 參考中的函式文件位於 MSDN library http://msdn.microsoft.com/library。For more information about processing Windows messages, see the `WindowProc` function documentation in the Windows Platform SDK reference located in the MSDN library at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫方法以處理作業系統訊息中識別結構。The following code example demonstrates overriding the method to handle operating system messages identified in the structure. WM_ACTIVATEAPP 作業系統訊息會在此範例中得知另一個應用程式會變成作用中處理。The WM_ACTIVATEAPP operating system message is handled in this example to know when another application is becoming active. 如需可用， ，並值，請參閱位於 MSDN library 的 Platform SDK 文件參考http://msdn.microsoft.com/library。For information about the available , , and values, see the Platform SDK documentation reference located in the MSDN library at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library. 實際的常數值可以找到 windows.h 標頭檔包含在平台 SDK （Core SDK 一節） 下載，這也是可在 MSDN 上取得。Actual constant values can be found in the windows.h header file included in the Platform SDK (Core SDK section) download, which is also available on MSDN. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc/VB/form1.vb#1)]
